com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class OrderDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.OrderDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrderDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class OrderDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrderDao
    The class OrderDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the Orders table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the OrderDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
